languages.text: "Место сенешаля — подле Вольного Торговца. Как вы сами знаете, иные могут и предать, и бросить в самый темный час. Если Лорд-капитан не может рассчитывать на своего сенешаля... да ни на кого он не может рассчитывать. Я такой судьбы вам не желаю, поэтому и дело свое исполняю как положено".

"A Seneschal's place is at the Rogue Trader's side. As you have learned, others can betray and abandon you in your darkest hour. If the Lord Captain cannot count on {mf|his|her} Seneschal, there is no one {mf|he|she} can count on. That is not a fate that I wish for you, so I am doing my duty."
languages.original_text: "Место сенешаля — подле Вольного Торговца. Как вы сами знаете, иные могут и предать, и бросить в самый темный час. Если Лорд-капитан не может рассчитывать на своего сенешаля... да ни на кого он не может рассчитывать. Я такой судьбы вам не желаю, поэтому и дело свое исполняю как положено".

traits.locale_text: "The Seneschal's place is at the Rogue Trader's side. As you know, others can betray and abandon you in your darkest hour. If the Lord Captain cannot count on his Seneschal. there is no one he can count on. This is not a fate that I wish for you, so I am doing my duty."

languages.text: “总领就该时时刻刻留在行商浪人身边。如您所知，别人可能会在您最艰难的时刻背叛您，抛弃您。如果领主舰长连{mf|他|她}的总领都无法指望，那{mf|他|她}就没有任何人可以依靠了。我不希望您遭遇这样的命运，因此，我时时刻刻都在尽我的责任。”
languages.original_text: "A Seneschal's place is at the Rogue Trader's side. As you have learned, others can betray and abandon you in your darkest hour. If the Lord Captain cannot count on {mf|his|her} Seneschal, there is no one {mf|he|she} can count on. That is not a fate that I wish for you, so I am doing my duty."

traits.locale_text: “总领就该时时刻刻留在行商浪人身边。如您所知，别人可能会在您最艰难的时刻背叛您，抛弃您。如果领主舰长连{mf|他|她}的总领都无法指望，那{mf|他|她}就没有任何人可以依靠了。我不希望您遭遇这样的命运，因此，我时时刻刻都在尽我的责任。”

languages.text: «El lugar de un Senescal es junto a su Comerciante Independiente. Como ya ha descubierto, otros pueden traicionarl{mf|e|a} y abandonarl{mf|e|a} en sus momentos más bajos. Si {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán no puede contar con su Senescal, no puede contar con nadie. No le deseo ese destino, por lo que cumplo con mi deber».
languages.original_text: "A Seneschal's place is at the Rogue Trader's side. As you have learned, others can betray and abandon you in your darkest hour. If the Lord Captain cannot count on {mf|his|her} Seneschal, there is no one {mf|he|she} can count on. That is not a fate that I wish for you, so I am doing my duty."

traits.locale_text: «El lugar de un Senescal es junto a su Comerciante Independiente. Como ya ha descubierto, otros pueden traicionarl{mf|e|a} y abandonarl{mf|e|a} en sus momentos más bajos. Si {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán no puede contar con su Senescal, no puede contar con nadie. No le deseo ese destino, por lo que cumplo con mi deber».

languages.text: 「家令長のいるべき場所は自由開拓者のお傍です。もうお分かりでしょうが、他の者は、どん底に陥った時に裏切ったり見捨たりするのです。ロード・キャプテンが家令長を頼れないのなら、頼れる相手など一人もいません。我は陛下がそのような運命を辿ることは望んではおりません。さて、任務を続けるとしましょうか」
languages.original_text: "A Seneschal's place is at the Rogue Trader's side. As you have learned, others can betray and abandon you in your darkest hour. If the Lord Captain cannot count on {mf|his|her} Seneschal, there is no one {mf|he|she} can count on. That is not a fate that I wish for you, so I am doing my duty."

traits.locale_text: 「家令長のいるべき場所は自由開拓者のお傍です。もうお分かりでしょうが、他の者は、どん底に陥った時に裏切ったり見捨たりするのです。ロード・キャプテンが家令長を頼れないのなら、頼れる相手など一人もいません。我は陛下がそのような運命を辿ることは望んではおりません。さて、任務を続けるとしましょうか」

languages.text: "Der Platz eines Truchsess ist an der Seite des Freihändlers. Wie Ihr erfahren habt, können andere Euch in Eurer dunkelsten Stunde verraten und im Stich lassen. Wenn der Lord Captain sich nicht auf seinen Truchsess verlassen kann, kann er sich auf niemanden verlassen. Das ist kein Schicksal, das ich Euch wünsche, daher tue ich meine Pflicht."
languages.original_text: "A Seneschal's place is at the Rogue Trader's side. As you have learned, others can betray and abandon you in your darkest hour. If the Lord Captain cannot count on {mf|his|her} Seneschal, there is no one {mf|he|she} can count on. That is not a fate that I wish for you, so I am doing my duty."

traits.locale_text: "Der Platz eines Truchsess ist an der Seite des Freihändlers. Wie Ihr erfahren habt, können andere Euch in Eurer dunkelsten Stunde verraten und im Stich lassen. Wenn der Lord Captain sich nicht auf seinen Truchsess verlassen kann, kann er sich auf niemanden verlassen. Das ist kein Schicksal, das ich Euch wünsche, daher tue ich meine Pflicht."

languages.text: « La place d'un sénéchal est auprès {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Comme vous l'avez appris, les autres sont susceptibles de vous trahir et de vous abandonner au pire moment. Si {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne peut pas compter sur son bras droit, autant dire qu'{mf|il est seul|elle est seule} au monde. C'est un sort que je ne vous souhaite pas, raison pour laquelle je reste fidèle à mon devoir. »
languages.original_text: "A Seneschal's place is at the Rogue Trader's side. As you have learned, others can betray and abandon you in your darkest hour. If the Lord Captain cannot count on {mf|his|her} Seneschal, there is no one {mf|he|she} can count on. That is not a fate that I wish for you, so I am doing my duty."

traits.locale_text: « La place d'un sénéchal est auprès {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Comme vous l'avez appris, les autres sont susceptibles de vous trahir et de vous abandonner au pire moment. Si {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne peut pas compter sur son bras droit, autant dire qu'{mf|il est seul|elle est seule} au monde. C'est un sort que je ne vous souhaite pas, raison pour laquelle je reste fidèle à mon devoir. »

languages.text: "Bir Seneşal'in yeri Hür Tacir'in yanıdır. Net bir şekilde öğrendiğiniz üzere başkaları size ihanet edebilir, en zor anınızda sizi yüzüstü bırakabilir. Eğer Seneşal'ine güvenemeyecekse Lord Kaptan'ın güvenebileceği kimse yok demektir. Sizin böyle bir şey yaşamanızı katiyetle istemem, dolayısıyla yalnızca görevimi yapıyorum."
languages.original_text: "A Seneschal's place is at the Rogue Trader's side. As you have learned, others can betray and abandon you in your darkest hour. If the Lord Captain cannot count on {mf|his|her} Seneschal, there is no one {mf|he|she} can count on. That is not a fate that I wish for you, so I am doing my duty."
